extendedInfo.description: Resources for Commercial and Residential Real Estate Owners, Buyers, Sellers and Related ProfessionalsInspection-perfection.com is an ever growing resource center for residential and commercial property owners. Articles are written by Carl Brahe, commercial and residential real estate inspector. Information is presented from my professional perspective. My job is to identify defects in a property and document them in a way that is easy to understand. I look for the things that can endanger the lives of you and your family, endanger the property and those things that cost you to repair, update or replace (deferred maintenance).  These are some of the things I include.Health and Safety Issues:â¢	Meth residue in your home, business or vehicle from smoking or manufactureâ¢	Mold  â¢	Indoor air qualityâ¢	Radonâ¢	Bed bugsâ¢	Carbon monoxideâ¢	Insects, rodents and reptiles in your homeâ¢	Waterâ¢	Marijuana grow roomsâ¢	3rd hand tobacco smokeâ¢	Asbestos â¢	Moisture threatens health of people and buildingsâ¢	Environmental report for your home and neighborhodâ¢	MoreBuilding Defects:â¢	Things first time home buyers should knowâ¢	Using infrared imagery to  identify defectsâ¢	Common new home defectsâ¢	Plumbing and electrical defects and dangersâ¢	MoreMaintenance:â¢	Keep your home and business dry and healthyâ¢	Drainage problems destroy buildingsâ¢	Wood rotâ¢	HVAC â¢	Trees may be liabilityâ¢	Winterize your vacation homeâ¢	Septic systemsâ¢	MoreRepair, remodel, renovate:â¢	How much does it costâ¢	How long does it lastâ¢	How does it workâ¢	Prepare for saleâ¢	Fix and flipâ¢	Upgrade bathrooms with new faucetsâ¢	Mud jackingâ¢	Foundation cracksâ¢	MoreGreen resources:â¢	Energy â make your own, use it yourself or sell it to your neighbor or power companyâ¢	Checklist for commercial buildingsâ¢	Residential resourcesâ¢	Windows that heat your homeâ¢	Rubber sidewalksâ¢	Wood burning appliancesâ¢	MoreDIY inspection guide to:o	 Identify sources of health issues o	Identify deferred maintenanceo	Prepare your property for sale o	Educate yourself get the most from professional inspectionsOther related subjects are presented. The database grows continually. If you would like a subject included, please contact me: carl@inspection-perfection.com
